titleStmt.title: Von Ludwig Wittgenstein an George Edward Moore, [22. 7. 1945]
titleStmt.author: Wittgenstein, Ludwig

sourceDesc.p: Original bei Timothy Moore; Kopie im BA. Publiziert (Letters, S. 181; deutsch: Briefe, S. 220f.; Cambridge Letters, S. 319).

list.item: 2007/06: Conversion from Folio Flat File to XML

div.p: I'm sorry I can't come on Tuesday, but I can & shall on Friday, & I'm looking forward to it. â€’ Looking through a copy of the stuff I gave you I see that there are a good many nasty misprints, i.e. such as suggest a wrong sense. If I have an opportunity I'll correct them.
